data.drawler_header_label:
I Love Find The Difference
v1.6
data.about_name:
I Love Find The Difference
v1.6
data.about_body:
All level's background images are used with the personal permission of the author of this image or were taken under a suitable license.
If you have any concern regarding the use of pictures or any other questions and suggestions, please email to:
%1$s

This app does NOT collect information (such as first and last name, physical addresses, email addresses, telephone) that directly identifies you or another person. This app will use some impersonal information (including but not limited to language, country, advertise id, ip address) to improve our app and services. This information could be used in our and third party advertisement and statistics services. To learn more about how we use mentioned data read our privacy policy available by the link below.
data.i_play_super_game_message:
I play the amazing game - 'I ♥ Find The Difference'! 1500+ levels! Join me here:
%1$s
data.hello_and_welcome:
Hello and welcome to
I ♥ Find The Difference!
data.inactivity_notification_message_w_levels: %d unfinished levels are waiting for your attention!
data.inactivity_notification_message_wo_level: Seems it's time to check for the new levels or complete the unfinished ones.
data.rate_us_dialog_body:
If you like this game - please rate us.

Thank you for the stars!
data.tell_your_friends_dialog_body:
If you like this game - please tell about us to your friends.

Thank you!
data.well_done_all_levels_completed: Well done! Seems all levels are completed!
data.new_levels_on_date: New levels approximately will be available on
data.turn_on_internet_to_check_levels: Turn on the internet to check for new levels!
data.old_stay_online_to_check_levels: Stay online to know about new levels!
data.old_click_replay_or_moreapps:
Click 'Replay' to replay random levels or try another games by clicking 'More games'.
Thank you for playing our games!
data.click_replay_or_moreapps:
Choose what's next:
*Replay - to replay finished levels.
*More games - to try our another games.

Thank you for playing our games!
data.turn_internet_and_press_try_again: Turn on the internet and press 'Try again' to continue playing!
data.lots_levels_available_to_download: Lots of levels are available to download!
data.some_levels_may_available_to_download: Some levels may be available to download!
data.while_saving_to_storage: while saving to storage.. Probably no space left on device - check for free space and unplug device from the computer if device is connected with computer by usb cable.
data.wrong_clicks_dialog_desc: Use hints to discover missing differences!
data.picture_is_taken_from: Picture is taken from the site:
data.we_have_personal_permission: We have personal permission of the picture's author to use this picture in free Find the difference game.
data.if_you_have_any_concern: If you have any concern about usage of this picture or any another questions, please email to:
data.postpone_this_level_message: Click 'Postpone' to finish this level later or another option to skip and never return to it:
data.ad_sign_snackbar_dialog_message: Ad will be shown at the end of the level
data.option_reset_desc: Reset all game progress and statistics
data.option_reset_desc_old: Reset all game progress and statistics (purchases will remain)
data.reset_dialog_body: Do you really want to reset all game progress?
data.option_desc_sound: Turn on/off sounds in the game
data.option_desc_hide_found: Remove found differences from the scene
data.option_desc_all_features: Unlock all purchasable game features listed below
data.option_desc_unlim_hints: Use as much hints as you wish
data.option_desc_unlim_skips: Skip/postpone levels as much as you wish
data.option_desc_no_ads: Fullscreen ads between levels will be removed
data.option_desc_resolution: Use pictures with higher resolution (better quality)
data.option_desc_sequence: Choose to play the most beautiful pictures first (subjectively, by our opinion, may differ from another opinion)
data.option_desc_notification: Notifications are used to inform about new levels
data.option_notification_dlg_desc: To change the display of notifications goto the system Settings -> Notifications -> Select this app
data.notification_off_alert_dlg_desc:
Notifications are used to inform about new levels.
To switch the notifications on goto the system Settings -> Notifications -> Select this app
data.next_hint_will_be_recovered_in: Next hint will be recovered in
data.make_hints_unlimited_or_watch_video_and_: Purchase unlimited hints in settings, watch a video and recover
data.make_hints_unlimited_or_wait: Purchase unlimited hints in settings or wait for automatic recovery.
data.next_skip_will_be_recovered_in: Next skip will be recovered in
data.make_skips_unlimited_or_watch_video_and_: Purchase unlimited skips in settings, watch a video and recover
data.make_skips_unlimited_or_wait: Purchase unlimited skips in settings or wait for automatic recovery.
data.how_to_play_find: Compare two photos and find 10 differences between them. Click into the center of an area of the found difference.
data.how_to_play_hint: Use the Hint button (see upper game toolbar) if you cannot find a difference. Hint will be restored in some time.
data.how_to_play_skip: Use the Skip button if you get stuck and complete this level later. Will be restored in some time.
data.how_to_play_zoom:
Enlarge the pictures to simplify seeking, 3 ways:
1)pinch a picture with two fingers
2)fast double click the same point on a picture
3)use Zoom button from the upper game toolbar
data.how_to_play_online: Turn the internet on to get all the 1500+ levels.
data.welcome_about_notifications: Allow notifications to receive messages about new levels (see next dialog).
data.welcome_about_notifications_provisional: Keep notifications enabled to receive messages about new levels.
data.welcome_about_settings: Visit Settings to tune game features.
data.welcome_about_about: Visit About to read about privacy, licensing, etc.
data.statistics_overall_desc: Full number of levels in the game
data.statistics_wontplay_desc: Number of skipped levels which wouldn't be finished
data.statistics_time_in_game_desc: Total time spent searching for differences
data.statistics_miss_did_desc: Number of clicks outside the area of differences
data.statistics_avg_time_found_diff_desc: Average time spent to find one difference
data.statistics_accuracy_desc: Relative value depending on the number of misses and found differences (best result is 100%)
data.cannot_show_rewarded_video: Failed to show a rewarded video! Check internet connection and try again later
data.first_diff_hint_about_difference:
Look at the yellow hint circle! There is a difference!
Press it!
data.first_diff_hint_about_hint_button:
Hint button will help you!
Press it!
data.home_screen_no_internet_alert: No internet! Cannot check for the new levels!
data.consent_check_for_ads_off_notification: To disable ads use the 'Purchasable features' section in settings
data.unable_to_start_locked_level_no_accesses: Unable to start - lack of accesses!
data.level_was_chosen_but_offline: Unable to download the next level! To continue turn the internet on!
data.gs_tutorial_goal:
How to play:
The goal of the game is to find 10 differences between two pictures. Click the area of the difference.
data.gs_tutorial_skip: Skip levels and finish it later.
data.gs_tutorial_orientation: In the game settings select preferred orientation of the pictures (horizontal or vertical).
data.help_about_progress: An indicator of the differences found on the scene.
data.help_about_settings: Change game options: timer, hiding found differences, etc.
data.help_about_todo: Find differences between pictures and click on it.
data.help_about_zoom: Zoom in scene to find all differences.
data.help_about_hint: Hint will show one of the undetected differences.
data.help_about_skip: Skip difficult levels and finish it later.
